question: Where was the birth place of Babur?
explanation: On February 14, 1483 AD, Zahiruddin Muhammad Babur was born in the Timurid royal family of Farghana kingdom ( now in Uzbekistan). He was a descendant of Timur on his father’s side and of Chengez Khan on his mother’s side. In 1526 AD, he laid the foundation of Mughal empire in India by defeating Sultam Ibrahim Lodi in the battle of Panipat..
